MajorClaims.Text: it is the best way for teenage children to take a part-time job to prepare their adult life
to encourage children taking a part-time job is a good choice for them to get prepared for adult life

Claims.Text: it is an oppertunity to learn how to deal with money
by taking a part-time job, they certainly have to be responsible for anything they have done
to help their children to adapt adult life, parents should let them experience it as much as they can

Premises.Text: when I was 16, I found a job during summer vacation and earned some money by own
At the beginning of the semester, I was told to buy a text book
I spent most of my salary hanging out with my friend
I finally realized that I should learn to make a plan before I spend my money, and that did influence me in my life now
when children get a job, they are able to earn money by themselves, instead of getting pocket money from their parents
if a student get a job in a company but he is frequently late for work, the company may reduce his payment or even fire him
To compare with the school life, they might suffer only a small punishment at school
Under the circumstances, he will learn that he has to obey the rule and take responsibility for their work
